text: Butterflies Are Free is a 1972 American comedy drama movie directed by Milton Katselas and based on the play of the same name by Leonard Gershe. It stars Goldie Hawn, Edward Albert, Eileen Heckart, Michael Glaser and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1973. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1972 comedy-drama movies Category:1972 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about blind people Category:Movies set in San Francisco
title: Butterflies Are Free
